name: Format Options
description:
As a logged-in user of SUT
I want to be able to format columns
So that they are easier to monitor

elements.name: Log in and get initial state.

steps.name: that I have opened SUT and it is ready

elements.name: Assert the column format dialog is as expected

steps.name: that I have opened SUT and it is ready
the column format dialog is open for a numeric column
the column format dialog looks like this:
that I have opened SUT and it is ready
I have typed "XXX.ShemaFinal" into the header of column 3
I have selected the first entry from the auto-suggestion list
"Close" is displayed in the header of column 3
I set the format of column 3:
the data in column 3 is set to 2 decimal places
a background color is applied to the cells in column 3
I set the format of column 3:
column 3 is set to its default background colour
that I have opened SUT and it is ready
I have typed "XXX.FoobId" into the header of column 3
I have selected the first entry from the auto-suggestion list
"Bid" is displayed in the header of column 3
I set the format of column 3:
the data in column 3 is set to 2 decimal places
a background color is applied to the cells in column 3
I set the format of column 3:
column 3 is set to its default background colour
that I have opened SUT and it is ready
I have typed "XXX.FloatPercentage" into the header of column 3
I have selected the first entry from the auto-suggestion list
"Float Percent" is displayed in the header of column 3
I set the format of column 3:
the data in column 3 is set to 2 decimal places
a background color is applied to the cells in column 3
I set the format of column 3:
column 3 is set to its default background colour
that I have opened SUT and it is ready
I have typed "XX_Final" into the header of column 3
I have selected the first entry from the auto-suggestion list
"Last" is displayed in the header of column 3
I set the format of column 3:
the data in column 3 is set to 2 decimal places
a background color is applied to the cells in column 3
I set the format of column 3:
column 3 is set to its default background colour
that I have opened SUT and it is ready
I have typed "XXX.BumblEactuaL" into the header of column 3
I have selected the first entry from the auto-suggestion list
"Total Assets - Actual" is displayed in the header of column 3
I set the format of column 3:
the data in column 3 is set to 2 decimal places
a background color is applied to the cells in column 3
I set the format of column 3:
column 3 is set to its default background colour
that I have opened SUT and it is ready
I have typed "XXX.Volume" into the header of column 3
I have selected the first entry from the auto-suggestion list
"Volume" is displayed in the header of column 3
I set the format of column 3:
the data in column 3 is set to 2 decimal places
a background color is applied to the cells in column 3
I set the format of column 3:
column 3 is set to its default background colour
